item.title: RMarkdown to Github Pages
item.description: Turn Rmarkdown output into Github Pages If you Google this topic you will find this GitHub and RStudio tutorial, which is quite long. Here is the short version: Name the output html file as index.html and go to repo settings -> GitHub Pages and point the source to where this file is. Also you can change theme just by clicking the buttom. You can assign the short domain names like liuyanguu.
